name: ASPIRE
summary: A Scheme for Promoting Innovation, Rural Industry & Entrepreneurship — supports rural innovation, micro-preneurship, and incubation to generate employment at grassroots level.

name: Advanced Training Institutes (ATI)
summary: ATI provides specialized technical and managerial training programs to upskill MSME stakeholders.

name: Coir Vikas Yojana
summary: Focused on development of the coir sector — supports improved production techniques, skill training, and linkages to markets.

name: CGTMSE
summary: Credit Guarantee Fund Trust for MSEs — enables collateral-free credit by providing lender guarantees for eligible micro & small enterprises.

name: ESDP
summary: Entrepreneurship & Skill Development Programme — training initiatives to enable aspiring entrepreneurs to launch and run MSMEs.

name: International Cooperation
summary: Facilitates international linkages for technology transfer, market access and international collaboration for MSMEs.

name: PMEGP
summary: Prime Minister’s Employment Generation Programme — credit-linked subsidy to set up new micro-enterprises and generate employment.
